website_summaries.verdict: Precise measurement at any moment with this easy to transport measuring device.
pros: Easy to carry and hard to forget with a trusty strap to wrap around your wrist
Designed for convenient and accurate measurements on the fly
Perfect for spontaneous projects as well as those that are thought out
cons: Given it's small size, the screen may be hard to read for some

customer_reviews.title: too tiny- works for some but not for all
customer_reviews.text: The good- it's compact, rechargeable and easy to carry. Comes with a handy wrist strap. The bad- the screen is really small and badly laid out so that much of the text (that's tiny on a tinier screen) is squashed to the right of the screen. It's great for the metric system (cms and metres) because the numbers can be read easily, but sucks when you're measuring feet and inches. The fractions of inches are impossible to read.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, very convenient, barely noticable in my pants pocket, but...
customer_reviews.text: Carry it everywhere. Have found it to be pretty accurate. Makes measuring pretty convenient. Even comes in handy on occasion for entertaining the cat. However it's small enough and the screen scratches fairly easily, that it can be difficult to read especially if you do in fact carry it in your pocket much. If I had my druthers, something a little bigger would be more practical.
customer_reviews.author: G Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Great for house shopping
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband as a stocking stuff. We are house shopping and it has been so handy to measure rooms and have a better idea of space quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am using it all the time. It is small, reliable, easy to use and cheap.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to reorganize my office, I measured every distance with it and built a 3d model on my PC so I I could move the pieces of furniture on the screen to see the result before placing them in the room I use it very often, it is rechargeable via USB. It did also end up in the laundry because it is easy to forget about it in a pocket but I was lucky it is still working. Honestly I bought because it was cheap and it is still working, really happy.
customer_reviews.author: Viny

customer_reviews.title: From here to there 😋
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! I’m getting new floors and I had several sellers come in to give me estimates. Each, of course, had a different square foot estimate. So I got the Distance Measurer and got real numbers. I also chose a company that gave me numbers different others. The reason I chose this company? His numbers agreed with mine...including the small rising step around the living room...and he was extremely nice. So there!
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy from Amazon warehouse
customer_reviews.text: I purchases from Amazon warehouse. I in fact bought two things from Amazon. First time shame on them second time shame on me. I might as well go dumpster diving. I wonder if they even look at the stuff that they're reselling. This thing was dead without the possibility of resuscitation.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This works really well when measuring large expanses. I took it with me on a house inspection and was able to measure rooms quickly and easily.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Thompson

customer_reviews.title: It's good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, and reliable. Battery seems to last forever (like months). Only thing that I wish could be better is that the screen is difficult to read in low light, even during the day.
customer_reviews.author: phiren

customer_reviews.title: Great Small size, holds charge for weeks.
customer_reviews.text: It what is it. Holds charge for a long time.... weeks at a time. I use for in home healthcare assessments to get height. Works great and perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Hello

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: working only first a few days. After siting on shelf for a couple month reading show approximately 1,5 time more then tape measurement. Now is to late to return. Don't buy that junk. l
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: One of a kind Works very well Very hard to ...
customer_reviews.text: One of a kind Works very well Very hard to get other than amazon Price very good
customer_reviews.author: William Elderkin

customer_reviews.title: A practical helpmate!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this laser ruler and its so practical. For just $12 bucks, you get something small, extremely lightweight, no batteries needed and very functional. Too just measure distances for up to 30ft, you cant go wrong!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Works great but tiny!
customer_reviews.text: Shoulda read the dimensions. This thing works great but is beyond tiny. Wish it was a bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Good product, needs better instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Use this product to measure my rooms for flooring. It did an excellent job. It was a little difficult to figure out at first because the instructions are not great. I would suggest better instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. When a contractor's didn't work, we used mine.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: More of a toy or for a key ring. ...
customer_reviews.text: More of a toy or for a key ring. Works O.K. but a fiddle to turn from Metric to Imperial
customer_reviews.author: David Clulow

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and quick to use!
customer_reviews.text: I got some rough floor plans of my house roughed out in about 3 hours! Now what else to use it for...
customer_reviews.author: Jay G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it and it has helped me tremendously. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: M. C. Lunda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Long lasting batteries and very accurate measurer. The small size is a huge selling point in my mind.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Loveland

customer_reviews.title: ... it as a gift and the recipient seemed to like it.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a gift and the recipient seemed to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanbook

customer_reviews.title: ... female and need it for licensing- this is so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I'm female and need it for licensing- this is so easy to use! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Rivers

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Product is smaller then a pinky finger. Pictures are very deceiving.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Palmieri

customer_reviews.title: Useful, accurate, but a battery hog
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so, first I need to clarify that, yes, when I first got this, I used almost an entire battery charge just pointing it at things and getting measurements. And occasionally going, "Pew! Pew!", as I did so. With that silliness done, though, I used it to measure a length of wall to make sure a piece of furniture would fit, then in my garage to assemble a Tetris-like tumble of boxes into a much neater, tighter arrangement and various other things. Actually, it's incredibly useful to be able to determine, with basically the press of a button. It loses a star because it really does eat through the batteries, especially compared to the similar B&D model my father-in-law has.
customer_reviews.author: J. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Good for simple jobs
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent laser distance measurer. One downfall is it's limited to 30 feet. I've found though, that it accurately measures indoors. It got the same results as my Bosch laser measurer. If you are just doing little home improvement items here or there, I would recommend this. If you are a professional or a DIY that does many projects, you should invest in a more advanced laser distance measurer that can plot your measurements on diagrams and also measure angles.
customer_reviews.author: W. Simpsen

customer_reviews.title: Screen is so small
customer_reviews.text: This is handy for measuring floor space for carpet, tile, etc or for just getting room dimensions for furniture. It's small enough to fit in your pocket which is cool. The problem that I have is seeing everything displayed on the screen. I am past 40 and it's getting harder to see small print but this is REALLY small in some cases. If you don't have issues with small print, it should work well for you otherwise you might want to go with a larger model.
customer_reviews.author: Ferdy

customer_reviews.title: Cool little gadget
customer_reviews.text: I did not know a product like this existed until recently. It's really cool! It's very easy to use, too. You just point the laser dot at a wall or whatever, and it measures the distance from where you are standing. I am moving soon and have been using it to take room measurements. The battery is rechargeable, which is a big plus, and it's very small. I hoped it would double as a cat toy, but the dot switches itself off after a short time, leaving my cat mystified. I think it would make a good stocking stuffer or gift!
customer_reviews.author: WLJ

customer_reviews.title: battery stopped charging early
customer_reviews.text: Similar to some other reviews, after several months (less than a year) the battery has stopped charging. Until then it was a nicely working, compact device. Just did not last. Purchase was from Walmart, so is not a "verified" Amazon purchase, but it's the same device.
customer_reviews.author: road wanderer

customer_reviews.title: Handy but somewhat limited function
customer_reviews.text: This little gizmo is handy for pocket or purse and far lighter than carrying a tape measure around. I use it to measure wall spaces. The only drawback I can see is that it can’t measure an item that doesn’t have an end. For example I wasn’t able to figure out how to measure the width of a hutch because it has to have a wall or something to measure into. It’s great for measuring rooms or a distance to something.
customer_reviews.author: Fuji

customer_reviews.title: Tiny and Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Tiny and accurate. I'm not a super handy person but this has been terrific for when I need to measure things, especially on my own. Fits easily in my hand and is simple to use. The display is big enough for me to read. So much easier and lighter than my old fashioned tape measure. Would make an outstanding stocking stuffer for the DIY person in your life.
customer_reviews.author: D. Tobin

customer_reviews.title: Fairly precise at short to intermediate distances
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about the accuracy but it's actually quite decent at closer ranges. I haven't confirmed its precision at 30 feet, which worries me because if you're relying on this to cut lumber and it can be off by 1/4" then you might be wasting lumber. The measurement is taken from the back of the device to the target - and I didn't realize this until I noticed my measurements were consistently 2 inches longer than the front.
customer_reviews.author: Krazy Kat

customer_reviews.title: Works well and easily.
customer_reviews.text: Easily charged via USB (an eleven inch USB cable is included). Easily used by pushing a button. Range of 30 feet goes along with the price difference between this one and those with a longer range. Minimal features, but does just what it says it does and is small enough to lose quite easily if you don’t used the lanyard (included).
customer_reviews.author: Tanstaafl

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy for 1 man measurements. i checked it against my tape measure and it is accurate for me down to the eighth inch. I only use it for rough measurements so i am not cutting lumber or anything with it but i am sure you could make it work for that as well. push the button and bam you got your length. great tool for estimating sqft for a project or carpet etc etc
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Fun tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun little tool. Could fit easily in a console or an ashtray of a car, or in your pocket. Put simply is uses laser/digital technology to measure distances like a measuring tape. Because of the limitations of this device, I would use it more for estimates than for exact measurements. Nevertheless it is a fun tool.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Walker

customer_reviews.title: cool tool
customer_reviews.text: This is SOOOO cool!! Truly a cool gadget. I love gadgets and projects and am in love with my newest!! Stanley always makes a good product, and this little guy is no exception
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Zolar

product_meta.title: Stanley STHT77425 TLM30 Pocket Laser Distance Measurer, 30'
product_meta.description: The STANLEY STHT77425 TLM30 30 ft Pocket Laser Distance Measurer allows you to capture measurements on the go with the STANLEY TLM30 Pocket Laser Distance Measurer. The pocket size is easy to carry and the 30’ range (10m) is great for most interior measurements. This units features accuracy of 1/4" at 30 ft. Powered by a lithium-Ion battery that allows for on the go USB charging. Common uses include estimations and taking linear measurements. Laser Class 2 / Output less than or equal to 1mW, 630-690 nm. Backed by Stanley's Limited Lifetime warranty. Includes: 1) TLM30 Laser Distance Measurer, 1) USB Charging Cable, 1) Wrist strap.
feature_bullets: 30 foot range for tackling most measuring tasks
Lithium-Ion battery for on the go USB charging
Laser Class 2/ output less than or equal to 1mw, 630-690 Nm
Backed by a Stanley 2 year warranty

specifications.Included Components: 1) TLM30 Laser Distance Measurer, 1) USB Charging Cable, 1) Wrist strap.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars96 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
